summary: The National Weather Service Communications Improvement Act mandates the upgrade of the National Weather Service's instant messaging system, NWSChat, with a commercial off-the-shelf solution by October 1, 2027. The bill requires the new system to be cloud-hosted, scalable, user-friendly, and similar to existing commercial solutions. It allocates up to $3,000,000 annually from 2026 to 2029 for this upgrade. The funding is to come from existing National Weather Service appropriations.
